graphql.query:
mutation {
  addNewEmployee(
    first_name: "John",
    last_name: "Doe",
    email: "johndoe@example.com",
    gender: "Male",
    designation: "Software Engineer",
    salary: 5000,
    date_of_joining: "2024-02-01",
    department: "Engineering",
    employee_photo: "john_doe.jpg"
  ) {
    id
    first_name
    last_name
    email
    designation
  }
}
